quote: Things do not change; we change.
author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden

quote: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: I change the world, the world changes me.
author: Libba Bray

quote: I never change, I simply become more myself.
author: Joyce Carol Oates,  Solstice

quote: Change your thoughts, change your world.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Changing is what people do when they have no options left.
author: Holly Black,  Red Glove

quote: all appears to change when we change
author: Henri-Frédéric Amiel

quote: Sometimes change was good. Sometimes it was even exactly what you needed.
author: Jenny O'Connell,  Plan B

quote: All that you touchYou Change.All that you ChangeChanges you.The only lasting truthis Change.Godis Change.
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: If you want to change situation, first change your thoughts and perceptions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your lucky enough to be different, never change
author: Taylor Swift,  Taylor Swift

quote: You change your life by changing your heart.
author: Max Lucado

quote: You must embrace change before change erases you.
author: Rob Liano

quote: What we can change is our perceptions, which have the effect of changing everything.
author: Donna Quesada,  Buddha in the Classroom: Zen Wisdom to Inspire Teachers

quote: You cannot change what you are, only what you do.
author: Philip Pullman,  The Golden Compass

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: To change the world, the best thing that you can do is to accept changes with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Change your thoughts to change your reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: None of us really changes over time. We only become more fully what we are.
author: Anne Rice,  The Vampire Lestat

quote: If you want to change the world,learn to change yourself first.
author: Hazrat Ali ibn Abu-Talib R.A

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: People do not change, they are merely revealed.
author: Anne Enright,  The Gathering

quote: You can't just wish change; you have to live the change in order for it to become a reality.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Nothing is easy. To change or to accept changes is difficult.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Change is in the air. This change reminds us that we are made and beautifully sculpted by the same power that orchestrates the change of season. Let this be the season you embrace and align yourself with this change.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: If you try to change it, you will ruin it. Try to hold it, and you will lose it.
author: Lao Tzu,  Tao Te Ching

quote: Each life experience poses this question: how do you want to be changed because of me?
author: Mollie Marti

quote: We cannot change what we are not aware of, and once we are aware, we cannot help but change.
author: Sheryl Sandberg,  Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

quote: You never change things by fighting the existing reality.To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: One day spent with someone you love can change everything.
author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day

quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: At that moment I had no mind to change, or not change, or throw against the nearest wall.
author: James Patterson

quote: Times change, as do our wills, What we are - is ever changing; All the world is made of change, And forever attaining new qualities.
author: Luís Vaz de Camões,  Sonetos de Camões

quote: People can change anything they want to, and that means everything in the world.
author: Joe Strummer

quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.
author: Mike Murdock

quote: Change can either challenge or threaten us. Your beliefs pave your way to success or block you.
author: Marsha Sinetar

quote: You are born with the power to change your life by simply changing your thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: This is how the entire course of a life can be changed: by doing nothing.
author: Ian McEwan,  On Chesil Beach

quote: Our dilemma is that we hate change and love it at the same time; what we really want is for things to remain the same but get better.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Everything changes in my life, and the world stays the same.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes

quote: Many people come to reinvention when life changes around them, but people come in all different stripes. I'm oriented to change.
author: Jane Pauley

quote: People are the most difficult thing in the world to change
author: Gena Showalter,  Oh My Goth

quote: A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.
author: Richard Bach,  One

quote: If you can't change your mind, you can't change anything.
author: Orna Ross,  After The Rising

quote: You can't just make me different and then leave
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: I like to change. A new lamp, a piece of art, can transform a room.
author: Madonna Ciccone

quote: You can change your mind, don't let your mind change you
author: Benny Bellamacina
